overview: One of the best collection of Indian music-- - The Valley Recalls - Vol.2. Shivkumar Sharma and Hariprasad Chaurasia live at Nehru Centre, Mumbai on 30th December, 1995. Includes interview with Shivkumar Sharma and Hariprasad Chaurasia. Track List:  Raga Bhupali  1. Alap  17:40, 2. Jod  18:24, 3. Gat in Jhaptaal  19:30, 4. Gat in Teentaal  13:51. Band: Shivkumar Sharma - Santoor, Hariprasad Chaurasia - Flute, Anindo Chatterjee - Tabla, Bhawani Shankar - Pakhwaj.
title: The Valley Recalls, Vol. 2
